Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to destroy a face-down Defense Position does not target.\n2. It activates immediately at the start of the Damage Step.\n3. If you attack a face-up monster and then activated "Book of Moon", if the attack target monster is in face-down Defense Position at the start of the Damage Step you can use this card's effect to destroy it.
